mapper.select: SELECT la.ensign_image_url ensignImageUrl,la.language_name languageName, la.id languageId FROM lt_language la LEFT JOIN lt_course co ON la.id = co.language_id WHERE la.`status` = 'putaway' AND la.hot_or_not = 'yes' AND co.`status`='putaway' GROUP BY la.language_name ORDER BY la.popular_sort DESC

SELECT `language`.id languageId, `language`.thumbnail_image_url, `language`.language_name, `language`.language_intro, `language`.price languagePrice, `language`.discount_price languageDiscountPrice, `language`.discount_end_time discountEndTime FROM lt_language `language` WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND NOW() BETWEEN `language`.discount_start_time AND `language`.discount_end_time

SELECT `language`.id languageId, `language`.thumbnail_image_url,`language`.language_name, `language`.language_intro,`language`.price languagePrice, `language`.discount_price languageDiscountPrice, `language`.discount_end_time discountEndTime, `language`.discount_start_time discountStartTime FROM lt_language `language` WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND NOW() BETWEEN `language`.discount_start_time AND `language`.discount_end_time GROUP BY `language`.language_name

SELECT `language`.video_path,`language`.id, `language`.language_name, `language`.language_intro, `language`.language_lightspot, `language`.price languagePrice, `language`.discount_price languageDiscountPrice, `language`.discount_start_time, `language`.discount_end_time FROM lt_language `language` WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND `language`.id = #{id}

SELECT course.id courseId,course.certificate_or_not certificateOrNot, course.course_name courseName, course.price coursePrice, course.discount_price courseDiscountPrice, course.discount_start_time, course.discount_end_time
FROM lt_language `language` LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON `language`.id = course.language_id WHERE `language`.`status` = 'putaway' AND course.`status` = 'putaway' AND `language`.id = #{id}

SELECT la.id languageId, la.ensign_image_url, la.language_name FROM lt_language `la` LEFT JOIN lt_course co ON la.id = co.language_id LEFT JOIN lt_order_courses oc ON oc.courses_id = co.id LEFT JOIN lt_order `or` ON `or`.id = oc.order_id WHERE `or`.`status` = 'yes' AND oc.course_validity_period > NOW() AND oc.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY la.language_name

SELECT la.id languageId,la.ensign_image_url,la.language_name FROM lt_language la LEFT JOIN lt_course co ON la.id = co.language_id WHERE la.status = 'putaway' AND co.`status`='putaway' GROUP BY la.language_name ORDER BY CONVERT(la.language_name USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci

SELECT id, language_name as languageName, `status`, foreign_language_name as foreignLanguageName, ensign_image_url as ensignImageUrl, thumbnail_image_url as thumbnailImageUrl, popular_sort as thumbnailImageUrl, language_lightspot as languageLightspot, purchase_notes as purchaseNotes, video_path as videoPath, language_intro as languageIntro, price as languagePrice, discount_price as languageDiscountPrice, discount_start_time as discountStartTime, discount_end_time as discountEndTime FROM language_talent.lt_language WHERE id = #{id}
